job.title: Data Scientist / Data Analyst
job.description: Description: Data Scientist / Data Analyst Requirements Location: Anywhere in US but wiling to work Pacific hours.   ·         3+ years of data science, data analytics, or business intelligence experience ·          Strong understanding of SQL  ( Strong - Strong) ·         Experience with conducting data analysis in  Python and / or R ·         Experience building clear and easy to understand dashboards and presentations    (Tableau - Strong ) ·         Ability to communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional partners of varying technical levels ·         Ability to define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to appropriate and accurate insights Pluses ·         Familiarity with Superset ·         Familiarity with running weblab experiments, efficacy studies, or product validation tests ·         Familiarity with machine learning basics ·         Familiarity with Airbnb infrastructure, including Airflow, Presto SQL, and Hive SQL ·         Experience creating and maintaining data pipelines ·         Experience supporting engineering product work
